name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Russell BUSKIRK, Appellant

judges: BEFORE: CAPPY, C.J., and CASTILLE, NEWMAN, SAYLOR, EAKIN, BAER and BALDWIN, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Russell BUSKIRK, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Brian Martin Monahan, Esq., for Russell Buskirk.

Robert Eyer, Esq., Northampton County District Attorney’s Office, John Michael Morganelli, Esq., Jay William Jenkins, Esq., Northampton County District Attorney’s Office, for Commonwealth of Pennsylvania.
